properties.name: Aunpyl Volcano
properties.legend: Dormant volcano. Height: 9216 ft.

properties.name: Hot Springs of Narak
properties.legend: A geothermal springs with naturally heated water that provide relaxation and medicinal benefits. Average temperature is 108°F.

properties.name: Sawayo — iron mining town
properties.legend: Sawayo is a mining town of 1820 people just nearby the iron mine.

properties.name: Rononaiga — iron mining town
properties.legend: Rononaiga is a mining town of 2527 people just nearby the iron mine.

properties.name: The Red Scorpion
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious stuffed scorpion with sweet kvass is served here.

properties.name: The Golden Tavern
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious mashed pike with dark absinthe is served here.

properties.name: Burthug Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Kakudaman Lighthouse
properties.legend: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.name: Oarawa Battlefield
properties.legend:
A historical battle of the Yamamoran Conquest. 
Date: January 8, 1991 Rockerley Era.

properties.name: Titon Monster
properties.legend: Old sailors tell stories of a gigantic sea monster inhabiting these dangerous waters. Rumors say it can be 10 ft long.

properties.name: Maldrithu Hydra
properties.legend: Elders speak of a huge Hydra who inhabits Maldrithu hills and prefers eating children.

properties.name: Bremrudgiz Forest
properties.legend: A forest sacred to local Old Yotunn Ancestors.

properties.name: Hakadofuni Pinery
properties.legend: A pinery sacred to local Nishiyam Circle.

properties.name: Alborough Palm Grove
properties.legend: A palm grove sacred to local Westen Totems.

properties.name: Wamobe Tigers
properties.legend: A gang of desert highwaymen.

properties.name: Barnetown Owls
properties.legend: A gang of mounted brigands.

properties.name: Walbokelis Falcons
properties.legend: A gang of mounted brigands.

properties.name: Pirates
properties.legend: Pirate ships have been spotted in these waters.

properties.name: Pirates
properties.legend: Pirate ships have been spotted in these waters.

properties.name: Betesham Column
properties.legend:
An ancient column. It has an inscription, but no one can translate it:
༭༣༕༷༾༩༃༡༬༶༰༫༖༒༃༮༺༙༮༽༺༘༺༪༕༩༲༒༪༭༤༁༬༆༧༠༮༌༪༉༭༐༚༤༈༄༂༇༃༆༇༓༈༄༓༆༵༈༓༤༼༅༨༜༔༆༘ༀ༸༚༓༸ༀ༴༿༒༡༪༆༸༁༗ༀ༼༗༔༉༡༹༚༧༤༦ༀ༊༼༕

properties.name: Shimonai Effigy
properties.legend:
An ancient effigy. It has an inscription, but no one can translate it:
༅༄༲༑༪༆༆༼༴༮༠༧༜༸༆༂༨༔༃ༀ༕༬༴༱༬༠༓༯༿༶༔༐༩༠༗༤༨༢༐༴

properties.name: Ruined Outpost
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient outpost. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Ruined Settlement
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient settlement. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Ruined Stronghold
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient stronghold. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Kagakodo Collection
properties.legend: A vast collection of knowledge, including many rare and ancient tomes.

properties.name: Travelling Extraordinary Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this extraordinary circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Travelling Fantastical Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this fantastical circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.name: Shathiz Melee
properties.legend: Warriors from around the land gather for a melee of acumen in Shathiz, with fame, fortune and favour on offer to the victor.

properties.name: Kika Fair
properties.legend: A fair is being held in Kika, with all manner of local and foreign goods and services on offer.

properties.name: Hawks migration
properties.legend: A huge group of hawks are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Badgers migration
properties.legend: A huge group of badgers are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Sharks migration
properties.legend: A huge group of sharks are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Diaphanous mirage
properties.legend: This diaphanous mirage has been luring travellers out of their way for eons.

properties.name: Distant mirage
properties.legend: This distant mirage has been luring travellers out of their way for eons.

properties.name: Illusory mirage
properties.legend: This illusory mirage has been luring travellers out of their way for eons.

properties.name: Bike Chasm
properties.legend: The Bike Chasm. Locals claim that it is completely flooded.

properties.name: Kyma Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Hatheham Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Allorguilla Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Pordielver Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Herzuebes Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.name: Interdimensional Rift
properties.legend: A rumoured interdimensional rift in this area is causing all known nearby beings to flee in terror.

properties.name: Disturbed Burial
properties.legend: A burial site has been disturbed in this area, causing the dead to rise and attack the living.

properties.name: Shar Cemetery
properties.legend: Rising from the desolate landscape, this sinister necropolis is a testament to necromantic power. Its skeletal spires cast ominous shadows, concealing forbidden knowledge and arcane secrets.

properties.name: Shiranaifu Graveyard
properties.legend: A desolate necropolis where an eerie stillness reigns. Time seems frozen amidst the decaying mausoleums, and the silence is broken only by the whispers of the wind and the rustle of tattered banners.

properties.name: Ladazyrion Crypt
properties.legend: A foreboding necropolis perched atop a jagged cliff, overlooking a desolate wasteland. Its towering walls harbor restless spirits, and the imposing gates bear the marks of countless battles and ancient curses.

properties.name: Random encounter
properties.legend: You have encountered a character.

properties.name: Samdrathos Mountain
properties.legend: A sacred mountain of Drake Beliefs. Height: 8203 ft.
